mapper.insert: /* 브랜드 신규 생성 */ INSERT INTO BRAND ( COUNTRY_CODE, `NAME`, ENG_NAME, LINK, `DESC`, USE_YN, CREATOR_ID, CREATE_DATE, UPDATER_ID, UPDATE_DATE ) VALUES ( #{vo.countryCode}, #{vo.name}, #{vo.engName}, #{vo.link}, #{vo.desc}, 1, #{vo.creatorId}, UTC_TIMESTAMP(), #{vo.updaterId}, UTC_TIMESTAMP() )
mapper.select: /* 매핑된 카테고리 목록 조회 */ SELECT BCM.CATEGORY_ID FROM BRAND_CATEGORY_MAPPER BCM INNER JOIN CATEGORY C ON C.CATEGORY_ID = BCM.CATEGORY_ID AND BCM.BRAND_KEY = #{brandKey} AND C.USE_YN = 1
mapper.insert: /* 매핑 신규 등록 */ INSERT INTO BRAND_CATEGORY_MAPPER ( BRAND_KEY, CATEGORY_ID, CREATOR_ID, CREATE_DATE, UPDATER_ID, UPDATE_DATE ) VALUES ( #{vo.brandKey}, #{vo.categoryId}, #{vo.creatorId}, UTC_TIMESTAMP(), #{vo.updaterId}, UTC_TIMESTAMP() )
